item.name: Chicken Curry Bento
item.description: Chicken Curry is much thicker and full of flavour,less spicy which is suitable for children too.
item.ingredients: Chicken, onions, ginger, garlic, chili peppers (turmeric, cumin, coriander, garam masala)

item.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bento
item.description: Juicy and tender chicken glazed in a flavorful homemade sauce, this classic Chicken Teriyaki prepared in the authentic Japanese cooking method. or brushed with the glaze until it has a nice and delicious luster. The two most popular dishes in Japan using this cooking technique are Chicken Teriyaki and Buri no Teriyaki (Hamachi/Yellowtail Teriyaki). Teriyaki is a name of a cooking method, not a name of a sauce.
item.ingredients: Soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, mirin, rice wine vinegar,garlic,green beans,enoki mushrooms,sesame seeds

item.name: Curry Sauce Bento
item.description: Curry Sauce is a delicacy that is enjoyed all around the world.It is a flavorful sauce that is most commonly served with rice, Japanese noodles, or bread.
item.ingredients: Stewing curry powder,flour, oil,potatoes, onions(or negi onions), and carrots

item.name: Spicy Chicken Bento
item.description: Juicy and tender chicken glazed in a flavorful homemade sauce, this classic Chicken Teriyaki prepared in the authentic Japanese cooking method. or brushed with the glaze until it has a nice and delicious luster. The two most popular dishes in Japan using this cooking technique are Chicken Teriyaki and Buri no Teriyaki (Hamachi/Yellowtail Teriyaki). Teriyaki is a name of a cooking method, not a name of a sauce.
item.ingredients: Sushi rice, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, honey, mirin, rice wine vinegar,garlic,green beans,enoki mushrooms,sesame seeds

item.name: Pork Bulgogi Bento
item.description: Pork bulgogi is the marinade itself and spicy,savory,sweet,gingery in taste.

item.name: Chumaki Set
item.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish of specially prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, combined with a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits. Chumaki is a sushi set and each set comes with soya sauce and wasabi.

item.name: Harmony Set
item.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish of specially prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, combined with a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.Harmony is s sushi set with combination of chumaki,gunkan ,hosomako and nigiri.Each set comes with soy sauce and wasabi.

item.name: Mixed Maki Set
item.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish of specially prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, combined with a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.Mixed maki is a sushi set with combination of chumaki and hosomaki, each set comes with soy sauce and wasabi.

item.name: Rainbow Set
item.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish of specially prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, combined with a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.Rainbow is a sushi set with combination of chumaki,nigiri,sashimi and salad, each set comes with soy sauce and wasabi.

item.name: Coke
item.description: Coca-Cola, or Coke is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by The Coca-Cola Company. Originally intended as a patent medicine, it was invented in the late 19th century by John Pemberton and was bought out by businessman Asa Griggs Candler, whose marketing tactics led Coca-Cola to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century.
item.ingredients: Carbonated water,Sugar (sucrose or high-fructose corn syrup (HFCS) depending on country of origin),Caffeine,Phosphoric acid,Caramel color,Natural flavorings

item.name: Zero Coke
item.description: Coke Zero Sugar, is a diet cola produced by The Coca-Cola Company.
item.ingredients: Water, Colour (Caramel E150d), Phosphoric Acid, Sweeteners (Aspartame, Acesulfame K), Natural Flavourings Including Caffeine, Acidity Regulator (Sodium Citrate). Contains a Source of Phenylalanine

item.name: Fanta
item.description: Fanta is a brand of fruit-flavored carbonated drinks created by The Coca-Cola Company and marketed globally. There are more than 100 flavours worldwide.
item.ingredients: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Orange Juice from Concentrate (3.7%), Citrus Fruit from Concentrate (1.3%), Citric Acid, Vegetable Extracts (Carrot, Pumpkin), Sweeteners (Acesulfame K, Sucralose), Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Malic Acid, Acidity Regulator (Sodium Citrate), Stabiliser (Guar Gum), Natural Orange Flavourings with Other Natural Flavourings, Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid).

item.name: Still Water
item.description: Naturally pure: evian water is delicately crafted by nature over a 15 year journey through the French Alps, for a unique balance of minerals.
